short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modify smoothcomp css to enlarge TV mode for Judo tournaments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The website that is targeted uses very small fonts and does not indicate the uniform color properly for judo.  This extension modifies the css for the page to increase the font size, hide unnecessary details, and color code the names on the ladder.
